Uses of Package
com.here.android.mpa.guidance

  • Packages that use com.here.android.mpa.guidance 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.common
    This package includes classes, interfaces, and enumerations that are generally used by other packages in the Android SDK.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance
    This package includes classes, interfaces, and enumerations related to guidance and turn-by-turn navigation, used by other packages in the APIs for Android SDK.
  • Classes in com.here.android.mpa.guidance used by com.here.android.mpa.common 
    Class and Description
    NavigationManager.UnitSystem
    Supported unit system types
  • Classes in com.here.android.mpa.guidance used by com.here.android.mpa.guidance 
    Class and Description
    AudioPlayerDelegate
    Interface for notifying NavigationManager.AudioPlayer functions used by NavigationManager.
    LaneInformation
    Gives information about a lane, e.g.
    LaneInformation.CrossingRestriction
    Crossing restriction to enter or exit a HOV lane.
    LaneInformation.Direction
    All possible directions the lane leads.
    LaneInformation.MarkingType
    Marking types for the divider and center marking.
    LaneInformation.RecommendationState
    Recommendation for taking the lane according to the lane connectivity.
    NavigationManager
    This class controls turn by turn navigation.
    NavigationManager.AlternativeRoutesListener
    AlternativeRoutesListener provides callback of alternative route updates from NavigationManager.
    NavigationManager.AspectRatio
    A measure of an image's aspect ratio which is w x h.
    NavigationManager.AudioEvent
    Used for enabling/disabling audio events during navigation.
    NavigationManager.AudioFeedbackListener
    AudioFeedbackListener provides callback of audio related events from NavigationManager.
    NavigationManager.AudioPlayer 
    NavigationManager.Error
    Navigation Manager Error
    NavigationManager.GpsSignalListener
    GpsSignalListener provides callback of GPS signal related events from NavigationManager.
    NavigationManager.LaneInformationListener
    LaneInformationListener provides callback of LaneInformation related events from NavigationManager.
    NavigationManager.ManeuverEventListener
    ManeuverEventListener provides callback of maneuver events from NavigationManager.
    NavigationManager.MapUpdateMode
    Map Update Mode
    NavigationManager.NaturalGuidanceMode
    Enum used to turn on/off features within natural guidance.
    NavigationManager.NavigationManagerEventListener
    NavigationManagerEventListener provides callback of general navigation manager related events from NavigationManager.
    NavigationManager.NavigationMode
    Possible Navigation Modes
    NavigationManager.NavigationState
    Possible states of navigation
    NavigationManager.NewInstructionEventListener
    NewInstructionEventListener provides callback of new instruction events from NavigationManager.
    NavigationManager.PositionListener
    PositionListener provides callback of position events from NavigationManager.
    NavigationManager.RealisticViewListener
    RealisticViewListenerAdapter provides callback of realistic view related events from NavigationManager.
    NavigationManager.RealisticViewMode
    Enum used to turn on/off realistic view (junction view and 2D signs).
    NavigationManager.RerouteListener
    RerouteListener provides callback of route re-calculation related events from NavigationManager.
    NavigationManager.RoadView
    This static class controls road view of turn by turn navigation.
    NavigationManager.RoadView.Listener
    Interface to report RoadView events.
    NavigationManager.RoadView.Orientation
    Used for setting the orientation when NavigationManager.MapUpdateMode.ROADVIEW or NavigationManager.MapUpdateMode.ROADVIEW_NOZOOM is used.
    NavigationManager.SafetySpotListener
    SafetySpotListener provides callback of safety spot related events from NavigationManager.
    NavigationManager.SchoolZoneListener
    SchoolZoneListener provides callback of school zone related events from NavigationManager.
    NavigationManager.SpeedWarningListener
    SpeedListener provides callback of speed warning related events from NavigationManager.
    NavigationManager.TrafficAvoidanceMode
    Specifies if traffic should be automatically avoided or not during navigation
    NavigationManager.TrafficRerouteListener
    This adapter class receives notifications from NavigationManager that indicates traffic re-routing events due to the use of different NavigationManager.TrafficAvoidanceModes.
    NavigationManager.TrafficRerouteListener.TrafficEnabledRoutingState
    Enum used to describes the current route re-calculation due to traffic's status.
    NavigationManager.TruckRestrictionListener
    Used to retrieve violated truck restrictions while navigating.
    NavigationManager.TtsOutputFormat
    Used for specifying TTS output format in which the text should be generated.
    NavigationManager.UnitSystem
    Supported unit system types
    SafetySpotNotification
    Notification of incoming safety spots during navigation/tracking.
    SafetySpotNotificationInfo
    Notification information for this safety spot.
    SchoolZoneNotification
    Notification of incoming school zones during navigation/tracking.
    TrafficNotification
    Represents the traffic notification for the current navigation session.
    TrafficNotificationInfo
    Represents the details information for the traffic notification.
    TrafficNotificationInfo.Type
    Type for a traffic notification, with regards to the current route
    TrafficUpdater
    Controls traffic update requests.
    TrafficUpdater.Error
    Traffic status errors
    TrafficUpdater.GetEventsListener
    Interface for report TrafficUpdaters events.
    TrafficUpdater.Listener
    Interface to report traffic status changes.
    TrafficUpdater.RequestInfo
    Holds the error code and request id from a request for traffic.
    TrafficUpdater.RequestState
    Traffic status enumeration
    TrafficWarner
    Represents the traffic warning information for the current navigation session.
    TrafficWarner.Listener
    A listener for traffic notifications which should be added to a traffic warner
    TruckRestrictionNotification
    Notification of incoming truck restriction during navigation/tracking.
    TruckRestrictionsInfo
    Represents information about truck restrictions on a road.
    VoiceCatalog
    Manages the voice catalog used to download new voice skins.
    VoiceCatalog.Error
    Error codes for VoiceCatalog.OnDownloadDoneListener.
    VoiceCatalog.OnDownloadDoneListener
    Callback from report that the voice catalog/package download is done
    VoiceCatalog.OnProgressListener
    Callback to report the catalog/package download progress.
    VoiceGuidanceOptions
    Specifies at what times voice guidance prompts are triggered during car navigation.
    VoiceGuidanceOptions.Range
    Represents a values range.
    VoiceGuidanceOptions.RoadType
    Represents the type of road.
    VoiceGuidanceOptions.VoicePromptType
    Represents the type of voice command.
    VoicePackage
    Return information about downloaded voice packages.
    VoicePackage.Gender
    Gender for a VoicePackage.
    VoicePackage.TravelMode
    Travel Mode of voice package.
    VoiceSkin
    Defines a voice skin used for guidance.
    VoiceSkin.OutputType
    Voice Skin Output Types
